DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether the axillary plexus block performed in lateral, head down position is effective in the perioperative analgesia in patients scheduled for elective surgery of the shoulder.
DOC.brief_title: Plexus Anesthesia in Lateral, Head-Down Position for Elective Surgery of the Shoulder
DOC.criteria: patients scheduled for elective surgery of the shoulder lateral, head down position not possible
